grid
Interface Grid

All Known Implementing Classes:
Environment
public interface Grid

a Grid is an aera of width x height "boxes". Each box can have a specific color and a char to be displaid.

Method Summary
 char getCharAtPosition(Position p)
          returns the char to be displaid in the box at positionp
 java.awt.Color getColorAtPosition(Position p)
          returns the color of the box at positionp
 int getHeight()
          returns the height of the grid
 int getWidth()
          returns the width of the grid
